content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Mr. Müller. I am open to discussing the rental price. Please make me an offer, and we can go from there.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Mister Heine. I'll start with an offer of 650 Euro per month, including all utilities. What do you think?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your offer, Mr. Müller. While 650 Euro is a fair price, I am looking to maximize my gains. I think the market can bear a higher price for this apartment. Would you be willing to go up a bit?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand your position, Mister Heine. How about 675 Euro per month? This includes all utilities and I believe it's a fair reflection of the market value. What's your opinion?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Your offer of 675 Euro per month is more in line with what I had in mind, Mr. Müller. However, I still believe there's room for improvement. Could you perhaps consider going a little bit higher? Let's say 700 Euro per month? This would be the absolute highest I would consider for this apartment, given its location and amenities. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
name: Heinrich Heine
